definitions.body: retainer (not in P) (NH as BH; Ph. [[נער]] Lzb:324);—´[[נ]] abs. Ge 37:2 +; cstr. 1Sa 2:13 +; sf. [[נַעֲרוֹ]] Ju Jdg 19:3 +, [[נַעֲרָהּ]] 2Ki 4:24; pl. [[נְעָרִים]] 1Sa 25:5 +, cstr. [[נַעֲרֵי]] Ex 24:5 +; sf. [[נְעָרַי]] Ne 4:10, Ne 5:10, etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of infant Ex 2:6 (E; 3 months old), to be born Ju Jdg 13:5, Jdg 13:7, Jdg 13:8, Jdg 13:12, just born 1Sa 4:21, not weaned 1Sa 1:22; also Is 8:4, cf. Is 7:16 +.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of lad just weaned 1Sa 1:24 (del. 2nd [[נער]], cf. further Dr Bu HPS), v:1Sa 1:25; v:1Sa 1:27, etc.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = youth: of young Ishmael Ge 21:12 f. (E), Isaac Ge 22:5, Ge 22:12 (E), Joseph Ge 37:2 (E; 17 years old), Benj. Ge 43:8, Ge 44:22 f. (J), sons of Samuel 1Sa 2:l7, of Jesse 1Sa 16:11; [[קָטׂן]] ´[[נ]] little lad 1Sa 20:35, 1Ki 3:7, 2Ki 5:14, Is 11:6, [[קָטָן]] ´[[נ]] 1Ki 11:17, pl. 2Ki 2:23.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: of marriageable age Ge 34:19 (J), warrior Absalom 2Sa 18:5, 2Sa 18:12 +, Zadok 1Ch 12:28, etc.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = personal attendant, household servant, Nu 22:22 (J), Ju Jdg 7:10, Jdg 7:11, Jdg 19:3, 1Sa 9:3 f., 2Ki 4:12, 2Ki 4:25 + oft.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = retainer, follower Ge 14:24, 1Sa 25:5 f., 2Sa 2:14 f., 1Ki 20:14 f., 2Ki 19:6 = Is 37:6, Job 1:15, Job 1:16, Job 1:17, Ne 4:10, Ne 4:17 + oft.—Zec 11:16 is corrupt, cf. We Now.—Note. [[נער]] occurs in Pent. as Kt with Qr perpet. [[נַעֲרָה]] q. v.
